Title: None
Description: The shareholder is not entitled to vote under any circumstances.

Title: Ordinary
Description: The shareholder is entitled to a single vote per share in all circumstances.

Title: Additional
Description: The shareholder is entitled to more than one vote per share in all circumstances. The votingRightsDetails field can be used to provide the number of votes per share the shareholder entitled to.

Title: Restricted
Description: The shareholder is entitled to vote in specific circumstances only. The votingRightsDetails field can be used to provide details of such circumstances.

Title: Enhanced
Description: The shareholder is entitled to more than one vote per share in specific circumstances only. The votingRightsDetails field can be used to provide details of such circumstances.
